DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine AZD2516 bind mGluR5 receptor brain . This help make accurate prediction efficacy dose future development programme .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Study Determine Central mGluR5 Receptor Occupancy AZD2516
DOC.criteria: Normal MRI scan Healthy male nonfertile female Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥19 ≤28 kg/m2 weight ≥50 ≤100 kg History disease condition may interfere objective study History previous ongoing psychiatric disease/condition Concomitant medication
